mapper.select: select fire_station_id, fire_station_password from fire_station where fire_station_id=#{fire_station_id}

select rn, report_date, report_lat, report_lon from(select rownum as rn, report_date, report_lat, report_lon from(select to_char(report_date, 'MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') report_date, report_lat, report_lon from report where fire_station_no=#{id} ORDER BY report_no DESC) where rownum <= #{endRowNo}) where rn >= #{startRowNo}
select fire_station_id, fire_station_point, fire_lat, fire_lon from fire_station_area order by fire_station_id, fire_station_point asc

select rn, report_date, report_lat, report_lon, report_no from(select rownum as rn, report_date, report_lat, report_lon, report_no from(select to_char(report_date, 'MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') report_date, report_lat, report_lon, report_no from report where fire_station_no=#{obid} ORDER BY report_no DESC) where rownum <= #{endRowNo}) where rn >= #{startRowNo}
